pr_title: Disallow changing 'enabled' on the root mapper.

timeline.message: Disallow changing 'enabled' on the root mapper.

timeline.bodyText: It's pretty confusing that this error message will contain the singleton type name: "The [enabled] parameter can't be updated for the object mapping [_doc]." I think we should address this in a separate, more general change to not pass in the type as the root object mapper's name.
timeline.author: jtibshirani

timeline.message: Disallow changing 'enabled' on the root mapper.

timeline.bodyText: I'll double check with someone from the distributed team that this change is okay.
timeline.author: jtibshirani

replies.bodyText: @original-brownbear would you be up for taking a look? I saw that you made several changes in this area recently.
replies.author: jtibshirani

replies.bodyText:
I think this is fine. This line seems unnecessary and makes the test behave less like a real restore as far as I can see anyway (just restoring the meta from the repo in a real restore).
=> LGTM :)
replies.author: original-brownbear

replies.bodyText: Thanks @original-brownbear ! It also seemed strange to me, that we would add the original mappings as part of restoring a source-only snapshot.
